term.title: normalization

item.text: A mathematical procedure which ensures that the integral of the square of modulus of a wave-function over all space equals 1. The constant required to ensure that a wave-function is normalized is termed the normalization constant.

sources.item: PAC, 1999, 71, 1919. 'Glossary of terms used in theoretical organic chemistry' on page 1956 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199971101919)
